key_features: Front view with indicator lights for Power/DSL, WLAN, Fon/DECT, Connect/WPS, and Info; includes power cable; product box highlights DSL, WLAN, and additional functionalities.
description: The images show a FRITZ!Box 7590 router in white with red accents. The first image displays the front view of the device with visible indicator lights for Power/DSL, WLAN, Fon/DECT, Connect/WPS, and Info. The second image shows the same device inside its packaging along with an included power cable. The third image is the product box for the FRITZ!Box 7590, confirming the model number and highlighting features such as DSL, WLAN, and additional functionalities. All images are consistent with the same physical object.
